subdisciplines.name: Medical Management of Intersex Traits
subdisciplines.description: The study of medical practices surrounding those who are intersex, including hormone therapies, surgeries, and psychosocial implications.

subdisciplines.name: Intersex Activism
subdisciplines.description: The study of the work, progress and impact of activist movements surrounding those who are intersex, including legal advocacy, support groups, and gender identity acceptance.
